faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Hishab

items.question: Is Hishab app completely free?
items.answer: Yes! You can use our core features completely free. The Pro version has more advanced features like AI insights, unlimited transactions, and family sharing.

items.question: How secure is my financial information?
items.answer: We use bank-grade security. All your information is end-to-end encrypted and we never share your bank information with anyone. Our servers comply with all international security standards.

items.question: Which devices can I use Hishab on?
items.answer: Hishab is available on both Android and iOS platforms. We also have a web version that you can use on any browser.

items.question: How do AI insights work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your spending patterns and provides personalized recommendations. It helps you with budget planning, savings opportunities, and achieving financial goals.

items.question: How does family sharing work?
items.answer: With family sharing, you can track budgets and expenses with family members. Everyone has separate accounts but you can manage family budgets together.

items.question: Is connecting bank accounts safe?
items.answer: We use read-only access which means we can only see your transaction history, not make any money transactions. All connections are made through bank-approved APIs which are completely secure.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy for Hishab
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to Hishab, a smart and simple AI-powered expense tracker. Your privacy is very important to us. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and what choices you have regarding your data.
privacyPolicy.agreementNote: By using the Hishab mobile app, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

whatWeCollect.title: 1. What We Collect
whatWeCollect.description: When you use Hishab, we may collect the following types of information:

accountInfo.title: Account Information
accountInfo.description: When you sign up or log in, we collect your email address for authentication and to associate your data.

financialEntries.title: Financial Entries
financialEntries.description: The expenses or income you enter are stored securely in your user account in our backend.

appUsageData.title: App Usage Data
appUsageData.description: We may collect non-personal data such as the version of the app you're using or error logs to improve the app's stability and performance.

whatWeCollect.note: We do not collect or store any sensitive personal information (like your bank info or address) unless you explicitly provide it in a prompt ‚Äî and even then, it remains private and securely stored.

howWeUseData.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
howWeUseData.description: We use your data for the following purposes:
items: To store and display your income and expense records
To filter and categorize your financial data according to your usage
To provide app features such as data export (PDF)
To improve the performance, security, and reliability of Hishab
howWeUseData.note: We do not use your data for advertising or sell it to third parties.

dataStorageSecurity.title: 3. Data Storage and Security
dataStorageSecurity.description: We use Supabase, a secure backend service, to store your data. All communication between the app and the backend is encrypted via HTTPS.
dataStorageSecurity.note: Your data is stored in a private user-specific database. Only you can access your personal financial data using your account credentials.

accountDeletionRights.title: 4. Account Deletion and Your Rights
accountDeletionRights.description: You have full control over your data.
items: At any time, you can choose to delete your account directly from the app.
This action will permanently delete all your records from our system ‚Äî we do not retain a backup once deletion is confirmed.

thirdPartyServices.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.description: We do not integrate any third-party advertising, analytics, or tracking SDKs at this time. However, this may change in future updates, in which case this policy will be updated and you'll be notified.

childrensPrivacy.title: 6. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.description: Hishab is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect data from anyone under 13 years old. If we discover that we've collected data from a minor without parental consent, we will delete it.

policyChanges.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you in the app or on our website.
policyChanges.note: The date at the top of this page reflects the latest revision.
